channel.title: Equip Ids Not Working?
channel.description: In RS2HD 562/659 when you look at the equip.txt file or something named similar to that, it contains a file that has the item id and the equip id for that item. For some reason though, when you apply the ids to the itemDefinitions they don't all work. One such as the Omni-Tiara (13655) The equip id is: [code]item = 13655 3123[/code] But when you insert it in the itemdefinitions, and then refresh the server it doesn't work. Other items tend to work, but a lot of other items just don't equip, does anyone know how to fix problems such as this?

item.title: Equip Ids Not Working?
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

In RS2HD 562/659 when you look at the equip.txt file or something named similar to that, it contains a file that has the item id and the equip id for that item. For some reason though, when you apply the ids to the itemDefinitions they don’t all work. One such as the Omni-Tiara (13655) The equip id is: item = 13655 3123
But when you insert it in the itemdefinitions, and then refresh the server it doesn’t work. Other items tend to work, but a lot of other items just don’t equip, does anyone know how to fix problems such as this?

Read full topic
